member.name: M:Castle.Facilities.BatchRegistration.ComponentScanner.InferType(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: This method always tries to obtain the type from the specified assembly.

member.name: M:Castle.Facilities.BatchRegistration.ComponentScanner.ObtainType(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Obtains the Type by checking if the typeName is possible a full type name, or just an namespace.typename and for the later case, it tries to load the type from the specified assembly
